title: gotocourt
body:
Enter court?
[[Yes|entercourt]] [[Not yet|endcourt]]

title: entercourt
body: <<entercourt>>

title: endcourt
body: <<endcourt>>

title: pearlspeech
body:
Hi! I'm Pearl!
What's your name?
[[Answer her...|answerpearl]] [[Don't answer her...|dontanswerpearl]]

title: answerpearl
body:
That's a funny name!
You're kind of funny looking too...
You don't seem mean like everyone else in town...
No one seems to like me...
The other kids aren't even allowed to play with me...
I wonder if it's because I don't have a daddy...
[[I'm sorry they are so awful...|pearlsorry]] [[Don't you know single mothers are always evil in horror...|pearlmean]]

title: dontanswerpearl
body:
Oh...okay...
You must not like me like the rest of the town...
The other kids aren't even allowed to play with me...
I wonder if it's because I don't have a daddy...
[[Oh I'm sorry...|pearlsorry]][[Don't you know single mothers are always evil in horror...|pearlmean]]

title: pearlsorry
body: <<hesterarrive>>

title: pearlmean
body: <<hesterarrive>>

title: hesterspeech
body:
PEARL!!!
Come here! I told you not to talk to anyone from town!
Oh...Sorry...
I didn't see you at first...
I hope my daughter isn't bothering you...
[[A little...|hestermean]][[Not at all...|hesternice]]

title: hestermean
body:
I'm so sorry...
I know most people don't want to talk to us...
Especially since I'm an adultress...
That's why I wear this red "A"...
In fact...I'm supposed to go to court later...
They are trying me for my crime...
[[How can I help?|hesterhelp]][[Sucks for you...|hesterignore]]

title: hesternice
body:
Oh thank the Lord...
I appreciate your kindness...
Not everyone is so good to us...
You see...I had Pearl with a man who was not my husband...
That's why I have to wear this scarlet "A" on my dress...
It stands for "Adultress"...
In fact...I'm supposed to go to court later...
They are trying me for my crime...
[[How can I help?|hesterhelp]][[Oof that's rough...|hesterignore]]

title: hesterhelp
body:
Oh thank you so much!
You could help by testifying for me at court!
Of course...
You'll have to dress like a man for them to take you seriously...
[[Anything to help a fellow woman!|playerchange]][[No way! Help yourself!|playerignore]]

title: hesterignore
body:
Oh...okay...
Well if you change your mind...
I'll be here...
You'll have to dress up like a man for them to take you seriously..
So let me know...
[[I've decided I'll help you!|playerchange]][[Yeah right...|playerignore]]

title: playerchange
body: <<playerchange>>

title: playerignore
body: <<playerignore>>

title: hesteragain
body:
Oh! Are you willing to help now?
Of course...
You'll have to dress like a man for them to take you seriously...
[[Absolutely!|playerchange]] [[No way!|playerignore]]

title: dryadSLinteract
body:
What do you want?
[[Let's chat!|dryadchat]][[I need help...|dryadhelp]][[Nothing...|leave]]

title: dryadchat
body: <<startdryadchat>>

title: dryadhelp
body: <<startdryadhelp>>

title: leave
body: <<leave>>

title: dryadchat2
body:
All the men here are so perfect...
They are all masculine and in charge...
If only the dresses for women weren't so ugly!
At least they are modest...
[[This is true...|dryadchatend]][[Are you serious right now?|dryadchatend]]

title: dryadchat1
body:
I hate it here in Boston...
Everything is so dry...
[[Boston huh?|dryadchatend]][[I'm grateful it's not raining...|dryadchatend]]

title: Node23
body:
Thank Gaia for laws!
Humans would run rampant if it weren't for the law...
You better rethink your morality!
[[I'll keep that in mine...|dryadchatend]][[I'm trying...|dryadchatend]]

title: dryadhelp1
body:
Try heading to the courtroom...
You'll need to disguise yourself as a man first though...
Even if it is horribly undignified!
[[It is terrible...|dryadhelpend]] [[Ugh...|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelp2
body:
Make sure and do whatever the men say...
It's so much easier that way!
And safer...
[[Hmmmm...|dryadhelpend]][[I always do what men say!|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelp3
body:
Make sure and avoid that terrible woman over there...
She's so protective be her daughter...
She should really ashamed more than anything...
[[Okay then...|dryadhelpend]] [[She seems nice...|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelpend
body: <<dryadhelpend>>

title: dryadchatend
body: <<dryadchatend>>

title: entercourtno
body: Women aren't allowed...

title: entercourtyes
body: Entering court...

title: endcourt1
body: Maybe later...
